name: Into The Deep (Powercore2000, Gameplay Student)
description:
Into the Deep is a survival horror game in which the player must face the depths of a corrupted cave to survive - Made for yogs fan game jam 2022.

Credits:

Powercore 2000 - Code and Modelling 

Gameplay Student - Code and Design 

Force2reckon - Design and Level 

MHoffman - Sound and Music 

Cyan - Enemy Modelling
